resources.string: Tarrakki is a comprehensive Wealth Management and Financial Planning App that enables you to make calculated, goal based investments, with just a few taps.
Invite Your Friends to Invest Using the Tarrakki App.
Are you sure you want to exit?

Financial goals assist you in making small, regular investments towards fulfilling your dreams. Tarrakki Goal Setting helps you make time-bound, risk-evaluated investments aimed at giving you the returns you need to achieve your goal. Select a goal and get started.
Our Recommended Fund for this Strategy
To own your dream home, your goal is to reach about \u20B93.95 Lakh. This means investing \u20B92.85 Lakh over the next 5 years, including a one-time lumpsum of \u20B910,000 up front.

Tarrakki helps you invest your hard earned money in mutual funds that best fit your income, age, and risk appetite. 

Watch your money grow beyond the rate of inflation. 

Achieve life goals and financial milestones faster. 

- Paperless Investing 

- Direct Plans (No Agent Commissions)
This fund aims to achieve long term capital appreciation, predominantly through investments in equity and equity related instruments of Mid Cap companies.
Move idle money from your bank A/C
Disclaimer: Expected returns are not guaranteed. The above calculations are based on historical returns. Investments are subject to market risk.

Why does the Inflation Rate matter?

The house that costs 60 lakhs today, used to cost 10 lakhs, just 20 years ago. How much is it likely to cost in the next 10 years? \n\nWhen you make an investment for a future goal, you want your future re-turns to be at par with the going market rates of that time. The inflation rate is calculated based on various fiscal parameters, to ensure that the return on your investment remains relevant in future.

resources.string:
Are you looking for Best Performing Tax Saving Mutual Funds for Investment? As the financial year, 2018-19 is about to end, you must have started tax saving and tax planning exercise of 2019. ELSS – Tax saving mutual funds play a vital role during tax planning exercise. ELSS (Equity Linked Saving Scheme) is one of the best ways to save tax and generate wealth.\nELSS offers tax benefits under section 80 C of the Income Tax Act. ELSS comes with a lock-in period of 3 years. However, ELSS offers multiple benefits to the investor.\n\n
Key Features of ELSS funds
ELSS is equity linked saving scheme. ELSS is a type of mutual fund that invests the major corpus in the equity market.
ELSS comes with both dividend and growth options.
ELSS funds come with Lock-in period of 3 years from the date of purchase.
Long-term capital gain tax is applicable to ELSS.
Investment in ELSS can be started with a minimum amount of Rs.500.\n\n
Benefits of Investing in ELSS Mutual Funds
ELSS is dual purpose investment. You can save tax as well as generate wealth by making the investment in ELSS.
An investor can claim a tax deduction up to 1.5 Lakh by making the investment in ELSS.
The lock-in period of ELSS is lowest compared to all other tax saving options such as tax saving FD or PPF.
ELSS provides higher returns compared to other tax saving instruments.
ELSS fund offers SIP investment option, which brings discipline in regular investing.
ELSS has no fixed maturity date or period. You can continue to hold ELSS as long as you can.
ELSS is the best tax saving instrument in terms of expected return, lock-in period and periodicity of investment.
Your bank mandate request has been submitted to your bank successfully. Your bank may take 10-45 days for the approval.
We\'ll keep you updated about the bank mandate status via email and sms.

Self-authorize your bank to auto-invest in SIPs of your choice. Login to your net-banking account online, and self-authorize your bank to auto-invest in SIPs of your choice at pre-determined intervals.

We provide the easiest way to do the NACH Mandate by generating the pre-filled e-Mandate form for you. All you need to do is take a print, sign the form, and upload it on the app. It will take 10 to 45 days for the approval but you can choose any maximum mandate limit.

Download the bank mandate form and fill out your details to set up Auto- Payments. This form allows secure auto-debiting of a specified amount of money towards your SIP, to create an easier investment experience for you.

Once you have filled out the bank mandate form, please scan the form and upload it.\nIn case your phone has a low quality camera, please download the CAMSCanner or Office Lens App from the Google Play Store, to scan the Bank Mandate.
Please look at the pre-filled Bank Mandate carefully to verify that all the in-formation is correct.\n\nDownload the Bank Mandate and Print.
Please double check that all information is correct and your signature is legible before Submitting the Bank Mandate.
Normally takes 10-45 working days for approval.
Normally takes 7-10 working days for approval.

Before opting for an investment strategy, rethink your priorities as practi-cally as possible. 

If you are investing in order to grow your money significantly in the long run, you may need to have a higher exposure to direct equity (stocks). This would require you to opt for an Aggressive or Moderate Investment Strategy. This also means that you may see the value of your portfolio go down, based on market conditions. The key to grow your money is to not get sentimental when markets dip, because markets that dip, inevitably rise again. 

If the safety of your invested money and capital protection in the near future is very important to you, you might want to opt for a Conservative Investment Strategy. While your money will grow very slowly with this strategy, it will also be less likely to see major ups and downs irrespective of market conditions.

When you make an investment in Tarrakki Zyaada, you are eligible to apply for a Reliance Anytime Money Card, powered by Tarrakki, Reliance Mutual Fund, and Visa.\n\nThis card is linked to the Reliance Liquid Fund, and allows you to instantly withdraw or spend money against your mutual fund investment. The card is valid at Visa enabled ATMs and merchant outlets all over India.

When you park your money in Tarrakki Zyaada, your money will be invested in the Reliance Liquid Fund, which can give you potentially higher returns than your Bank Savings Account or a Fixed Deposit. 

With your Tarrakki Zyaada investment, you get a Reliance Anytime Money Card, powered by HDFC Bank and Visa. This card enables you to use the money you have invested, should you want to. You can link this card to your online shopping account, use it for your Uber/Ola rides, and even book movie tickets online. It literally acts like a Bank Debit Card. 

This card is linked to the Reliance Liquid Fund, and allows you to instantly withdraw or spend money against your mutual fund investment. This card is valid at Visa enabled ATMs and merchant outlets all over India. 

It's like parking your idle money in a Savings Bank Account, but with the opportunity to earn almost double the returns.

Your money will be invested in a Liquid Fund. Liquid Funds invest in money market instruments such as certificates of deposits, treasury bills, commercial papers, and term deposits with maturities up to 90 days. 

• Lowest interest risk compared to other classes of debt funds 
• Invests in fixed income securities with short maturity periods 
• No Lock-in, No Entry and Exit Load 
• Minimum Investment of 2500 ONLY!
Potentially Higher Returns than your Savings Account or Fixed Deposit
Debit card powered by HDFC Bank & Visa towards your investment
Your SIP will start on April
